description: Intelligent resume scanning and candidate matching system powered by AI, automation, and semantic search for revolutionizing recruitment processes.

content.overview: At Sayaji Infotech, we implemented an intelligent resume scanning and candidate matching system for SearchEnds, delivering a cutting-edge recruitment platform powered by automation, AI, and semantic search that transforms traditional recruitment processes.

sections.title: ü§ñ AI-Powered Data Extraction
sections.content: By integrating Gemini AI, the system intelligently extracts critical information from diverse resume formats, transforming unstructured data into standardized schema capturing names, skills, experience, and other relevant details.
features: Gemini AI integration for intelligent data extraction
Support for diverse resume formats and layouts
Standardized JSON schema for consistent data structure
Advanced OCR capabilities for scanned documents

sections.title: üîç Advanced Semantic Search
sections.content: The platform leverages OpenSearch to provide powerful semantic search functionality, enabling hiring managers to find candidates whose experience and skills align closely with job requirements, going beyond basic keyword matching.

sections.title: ‚ö° Automated Resume Processing
sections.content: The system efficiently processes large volumes of PDF resumes from designated folders. A scheduler automatically scans and analyzes resumes, saving valuable time for HR teams and ensuring no potential candidate is overlooked.
features: Automated batch processing of PDF resumes
Bulk import capabilities with progress tracking

sections.title: üìä Intuitive User Interface
sections.content: A custom-built React frontend displays detailed insights and analytics. The user-friendly interface empowers hiring managers to define search criteria, view comprehensive candidate profiles, and make informed decisions.
features: Dynamic search forms with custom criteria

businessImpact: Dramatically reduced resume screening time through automation
Increased precision in candidate matching with AI-powered search
Enhanced team collaboration through sharing and editing features
Improved hiring decision quality with comprehensive analytics
